      • comparePickUpStatus

        public static int comparePickUpStatus(BatchInstance batchInstance1,
                      BatchInstance batchInstance2)
        Compare batch instance on the basis of priority of their status for Pick up.
        Parameters:
        batchInstance1 - BatchInstance
        batchInstance2 - BatchInstance
        Returns:
        int -1 if batchInstance1 is of higher priority than batchInstance2, -1 if batchInstance1 is of lower priority than batchInstance2, 0 otherwise.
